Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Platinum Residence places you in the heart of Warsaw, minutes from Warsaw Uprising Museum and close to Old Town Square. This 4-star apartment is close to Royal Castle and Lazienki Park.

Rooms
Stay in one of 219 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including a hair salon and shopping on site. Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Platinum Residence, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Platinum Residence, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including a hair salon and shopping on site. Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).
Stay in one of 219 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and blackout drapes/curtains.

A stay at Platinum Residence places you in the heart of Warsaw, minutes from Warsaw Uprising Museum and close to Old Town Square. This 4-star apartment is close to Royal Castle and Lazienki Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Warsaw Uprising Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Rondo 1 Conference Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Warsaw Ghetto - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Zlote Tarasy - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
ORCO Tower - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
John Paul II Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Saxon Gardens - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Palace of Culture and Science - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Reformed Franciscan Church - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Tomb of Unknown Soldier - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Palace of the Four Winds - 1.9 km / 1.1 mi
Grand Theatre - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Zacheta - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Duckert Palace - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Pilsudski Square - 2 km / 1.2 mi

The preferred airport for Platinum Residence is Warsaw (WAW-Frederic Chopin) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Note: *Please be advised there is a fee for early departures.* Arrivals after 10:30 PM require notice in 24 hours advance ** Credit card is required at the check-in.** Check-in starts at 2:00 pm on the day of arrival. Additionally the property charges a 100 PLN per stay deposit for incidentals in the form of a pre-authorization on the guest’s credit card. Cash deposits are not accepted. Cards belonging to third parties, payment cards, debit cards and virtual cards (without the physical presence) will not be accepted. Even if a third party executes payment for the costs of the stay, the guest must have a credit card during checking in and the Platinum Residence will carry out a pre-authorization on the guest’s credit card for the amount of 100 PLN per stay in terms of a deposit. Check-out time is 12:00 pm Residence is a fully non-smoking facility. Smoking is prohibited in apartments, common areas and balconies. Each violation of the smoking ban will be punished with a fine of 615 PLN. Apartment cleaning is included in the price of the stay and it is performed once in case of stays lasting at least 7 days.
